notes.text: Security update for python-azure-core, python-azure-storage-blob, python-azure-storage-queue, python-typing, python-typing_extensions
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update for python-azure-core, python-azure-storage-blob, python-azure-storage-queue, python-typing, python-typing_extensions fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-30187: Fixed an information disclosure issue that an
  attacker could exploit to leak sensitive information on the client
  side (bsc#1202088).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use
